DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: Mazda to Sell Ford-Built Car in Europe : The auto_maker said it reached an agreement with Ford Motor Co . to sell a small car based on the Ford Fiesta.Mazda Motor Corp. , which is 25 % -owned by Ford , will buy about 25 # 000 of the cars annually and sell them through its European dealerships starting in the spring of 1996 . After dropping a plan to set_up its own production facility in Europe , Mazda said in October that it was in the final stages of negotiations to buy Ford-made cars in Europe . The vehicle will have Ford engineering and Mazda styling .
